# hv_vm_remove_pio_notifier(_:_:_:_:_:)

**Function**

Removes an existing I/O notifier that matches the specifications you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
func hv_vm_remove_pio_notifier(_ addr: UInt16, _ size: Int, _ value: UInt32, _ mach_port: mach_port_t, _ flags: hv_ion_flags_t) -> hv_return_t
```

## Parameters

- **addr**: The port I/O address of the existing notifier.
- **size**: The match-size from the existing notifier.
- **value**: The value to match against from the existing notifier.
- **mach_port**: The Mach port from the existing notifier.
- **flags**: The [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_ion_flags_t] option flags from the existing notifier.

## Return Value

`0` on success, or an [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_return_t] error code.

## Discussion

The arguments you provide must match those previously used to add the notifier.

## I/O notifier functions

- **hv_vm_add_pio_notifier(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Generate a notification when the Hypervisor issues a matching guest port I/O.
- **hv_ion_message_t**: The structure that describes the Mach message that the Hypervisor sends when an I/O notifier delivers the notifications you request.
- **hv_ion_flags_t**: The bitfield that you use to set the options flags for the I/O notifier.
- **I/O Notifier Flags**: Flags that you set to choose the kind of information the I/O Notifier delivers.
